data.title: Events — Salamanca Cigar Group
data.text:
Come strike the mother load, and stake your own claim!

Join Don Alan Fonseca as he shares #TheSalamancaExperience with you. These distinctive and singularly exclusive cigars deserve your undivided attention. From the mild and flavorful Tempranillo to the bold and oily Mesmerize, your palate will be celebrating, non-stop!

Stop by and thank Larry for stocking these treasures.

Come Git you Some!

It’s #FonsecaFriday, so why not party ‘til you drop? So what if it’s Thursday? A cigar line so unique and good, Cigar Snob magazine staff members keep asking for more samples… enough already!

Join Don Alan Fonseca for an evening of fantastic smokes and cigar culture. If he can’t answer your question, he’ll make his website designer do push-ups. Really. He will.

Buy more than you can carry, and we’ll help you to the car with your boxes, ‘cuz that’s how much we love you!

Come in and thank Phil for carrying these exclusive cigars

The Cigar Factory welcomes The Don Fonseca, for an evening of tobacco exploration. Have you ever smoked a cigar with 4 fillers, 2 binders, and a premium wrapper that is smoother than silk? There’s a chance you may have… but not at this price!

The Don Fonseca is as gifted a Master Blender as you are likely to meet in this lifetime. Once you taste his Maduro, you’ll never want any other puro… just sayin’ #SmokinSalamancaStyle

Join us for an opportunity to meet and greet Don Alan, and to experience his art and artistry… great deals for that special Valentine will be available! #FonsecaFriday

Salem welcomes The Don Fonseca to this year’s first cigar event! We launched the Salamanca Project, and are the first lounge to stock these fabulous cigars, so join us to celebrate this special event.

Come on in and enjoy #TheSalamancaExperience, and meet the Don Fonseca himself! Eight different blends to choose from… try the best Nicaragua has to offer. Joseph NicaVana and Glandon Family lines are finally getting the recognition they deserve in various periodicals. Get these before they become that hard to find brand you regret not buying! #SmokinSalamancaStyle

It’s #FonsecaFriday, and don’t be caught without…

Eric welcomes the Don Fonseca to Napa Cigar, for this year’s first event!

Come on in and enjoy #TheSalamancaExperience, and meet the Don Fonseca himself! Eight different blends to choose from… try the best Nicaragua has to offer. Joseph NicaVana and Glandon Family lines are finally getting the recognition they deserve in various periodicals. Get these before they become that hard to find brand you regret not buying! #SmokinSalamancaStyle

It’s #FonsecaFriday, and don’t be caught without…

HAPPY NEW YEAR!

Bring in 2019, with a BANG! Come spend quality time with The Don, Alan Fonseca, and sample his genius, while enjoying the crazy deals he has in store for the holidays.

Alan has been spending a lot of time in Nicaragua, dodging bullets, drinking rain water, and blending up a storm… for you! Tell him, better yet show him, how much you appreciate his amazing talent!

Join Alan Fonseca for a Clip & Light Event , and an opportunity to try his new blends. Alan has been spending a lot of time in Nicaragua, dodging bullets, drinking rain water, and blending up a storm… for you!

Come in and sample his genius while enjoying the crazy deals he has in store for the holidays.

Join Alan Fonseca for a Meet & Greet , and an opportunity to try his new blends. Alan has been spending a lot of time in Nicaragua, dodging bullets, drinking rain water, and blending up a storm… for you!

Come in and sample his genius while enjoying the crazy deals he has in store for the holidays.

Come join the festivities and celebrate Father's Day, while honoring the Goomba of the house. Partake of this year's Italian Food Cook-Off, and pair your penne & prosciutto with the perfect puro! Forget About it!

Come meet Don Alan Fonseca and buy a box, or we'll put a hit out on you...
